recipe.notes: A long history of "YP" in my family, allegedly dating back to my never-met English grampa.
recipe.name: Yorkshire Pudding
recipe.preparation: Beat mixture and let stand for 1/2 hour.  Beat again and bake at 400º for 30-45 minutes.  Use 1/4 cup* suet or Crisco.  Make sure ingredients are room temperature.  Glass dish should be already hot before putting batter in.It just said "1/4" before, I assume cup.  Suet is pretty nasty stuff but I would assume its tastier than plain ol' Crisco.  I would assume the latter doesn't blow out your heart as much and is -certainly- easier to find.
